short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display's mobile only emojis on webtok

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Display's TikTok's mobile only emojis on the official TikTok website. Never miss the context of a comment again!

TikTok has its own emoji system, which is represented as [happy] on the web version. This extension will replace the text that represents the emoji with an actual image of the emoji.
